title: Land and sea
creator_credit: Keith Payne, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Keith Payne had a terrible acne problem when he was a youngster but it only got worse when he was deployed into the tropics. Unfortunately for Payne, his attempts to sign up to volunteer in Japan were shot down when the doctors looked at his acne and sent him home.
creator_credit_for_label: Keith Payne, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
